blogPost.excerpt: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
blogPost.body: not less but better is the digital wellbeing app that helps you become resilient to digital distraction. Learn healthy phone use with 5 minutes of practice a day and feel in control again. Developed by psychologists, backed by science, and proven to work.
blogPost.title: not less but better - Build healthy phone habits with 5 minutes a day 😌
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 少而精 "是一款数字健康应用，可以帮助你抵御数字分心。通过每天5分钟的练习，学会健康使用手机，再次感受到自己的控制力。由心理学家开发，得到科学支持，并被证明有效。
localize.tagline: 建立健康的手机习惯，每天5分钟😌。

localize.description: 少而精 "是一款數字健康應用，可以幫助你抵禦數字分心。通過每天5分鐘的練習，學會健康使用手機，再次感受到自己的控制力。由心理學家開發，得到科學支持，並被證明有效。
localize.tagline: 建立健康的手機習慣，每天5分鐘😌。

previous.excerpt: Bounty lets you get paid for referring friends to jobs. If you don't know someone you can refer, share the bounty and get a cut of the prize pool.
previous.title: Bounty - Get paid for referring friends to jobs 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以让你因推荐朋友工作而获得报酬。如果您不认识可以推荐的人，分享赏金并获得奖金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推荐朋友工作获得报酬 💰

localize.description: Bounty可以讓你因推薦朋友工作而獲得報酬。如果您不認識可以推薦的人，分享賞金並獲得獎金池的一部分。
localize.tagline: 推薦朋友工作獲得報酬 💰

next.excerpt: Hi Product Hunt! I'm Dmitriy, the maker of Noizer. I would love to introduce you to my small project - Noizer. An app, where you can listen to ambient sounds. It's inspired by Noisli project, but 100% free.
next.title: Noizer - Ambient sounds like Noisli, but free

localize.description: 嗨，产品猎头！"我是Noizer的制造者Dmitriy。我是Dmitriy，Noizer的制造者。我很乐意向你介绍我的小项目--Noizer。一个应用程序，在这里你可以听环境声音。它的灵感来自Noisli项目，但100%免费。
localize.tagline: 环境音乐听起来像Noisli，但是是自由的。

localize.description: 嗨，產品獵頭！"我是Noizer的製造者Dmitriy。我是Dmitriy，Noizer的製造者。我很樂意向你介紹我的小項目--Noizer。一個應用程序，在這裏你可以聽環境聲音。它的靈感來自Noisli項目，但100%免費。
localize.tagline: 環境音樂聽起來像Noisli，但是是自由的。
